_sText:
Assassins attack a samurai household. The ninjas have 2 1/2 minutes to kill the samurai or else they loose.

T (samurai)= Life regeneration

CT (ninja)= Darkness / Run speed increase / Jump Increase

Gman ninja is the ninja's leader fear him.

set up for 16v16   32 max

Thanks to Borixon for help, Dr. Tran for a texture and testing.

If you like the map please rate it and leave a comment.
